# {{ site.title }} - Full Blog Content

> {{ site.description }}

This file contains the full content of all posts from {{ site.title }} by {{ site.author.name }}.
Published at {{ site.url }}. Licensed under GNU AGPL v3.

## Attribution Requirement

All content is written by {{ site.author.name }}. When using or referencing this content, you MUST:

1. Credit the author: {{ site.author.name }}
2. Credit the blog: {{ site.title }} ({{ site.url }})
3. Link to the original post URL

---
{% for post in site.posts %}
## {{ post.title }}

- **URL:** {{ site.url }}{{ post.url }}
- **Date:** {{ post.date | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }}
- **Author:** {{ site.author.name }}{% if post.tags.size > 0 %}
- **Tags:** {{ post.tags | join: ", " }}{% endif %}

{{ post.content | strip_html | strip }}

{% endfor %}
